actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend the Surface Transportation and Uniform Relocation Assistance Act of 1987.

summary.text: Amends the Surface Transportation and Uniform Relocation Assistance Act of 1987 to mandate that at least ten percent and at least three and one-half percent of appropriated funds for Federal procurement of goods and services from disadvantaged business enterprises be expended with small businesses owned and controlled by socially and economically disadvantaged individuals and with small businesses owned and controlled by women, respectively.

titles.title: To amend the Surface Transportation and Uniform Relocation Assistance Act of 1987.
